name: Warcaster

auras.raw_description: Increases Void Ally C. RATE in all Battles by 23%.

skills.name: Tactical Ace
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Sealing Strike
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]br>Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10% LvI. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

structured_data.name: Warcaster

default_description: Warcaster is a epic assist champion from the faction Banner-Lords doing void damage
lore: Claiming his place amongst the most seasoned and battle-hardened warriors in Kaerok, the Warcaster is renowned throughout the ranks of the Banner Lords for his might. Recruited as a child from humble barbarian origins somewhere in the Deadlands, he was knighted at the age of 15, and later chosen to join His Majesty King Taybaâ€™s Royal Guard due to his fierce loyalty. Knowing his unshakeable faith in his cause and King, those who stand against the Warcaster expect little mercy once his mace is raised...
